body:
Comment 1: 
Note to self: this is the problem of insufficient method sets being code-generated that
we predicted could arise earlier this week in  
https://docs.google.com/a/google.com/document/d/1PirELLoi2ysyKfIfoqgQAlTE6AkgF14xMuNVOfRIJdk/edit

The fix is to ensure that all types derivable via reflection have method-sets generated
for them.

A workaround for now is to run oracle with --reflect=false.
